news.name: My first news
news.description: Hi there, welcome to my project which is made in ReactJS | Redux. Have a nice day!

news.name: My second news
news.description: Capping off undoubtedly the most exciting game of the tournament, Argentina shocked France to become the 2022 FIFA World Cup Champions.

news.name: My third news
news.description: Just the third World Cup Final to go into a penalty shootout, Mbappé started the tense sequence by scoring against Argentinan goalkeeper Emiliano Martínez once again.

news.name: Russia-Ukraine war
news.description: Ukrainian troops have won a major victory against Russia, taking control of the western Kherson region, including Kherson city.
